00080 # MicropolisHistoryPanel
00081

00083 class MicropolisHistoryPanel(gtk.Frame):
00084 
00085 
00086     def __init__(
00087         self,
00088         engine=None,
00089         **args):
00090 
00091         gtk.Frame.__init__(
00092             self,
00093             **args)
00094 
00095         self.engine = engine
00096 
00097         # Views
00098 
00099         historyView = micropolishistoryview.MicropolisHistoryView(
00100             engine=engine)
00101         self.historyView = historyView
00102         self.add(historyView)
